data.persona: I'm exiled from my homeland. My morals were not endeared my the invaders. I hate the life of an exile.
data.description:
You are in the beach house.
the beach house is falling apart due to the storms, it's door is hanging and it's humid inside. There is no floor, just sand, and a hole to serve as the outhouse.
There's a Message in a bottle, an oar, a Window, a the beach house, a door, a sand, an it's door, and an a hole here.
The spider is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give Message in a bottle to spider

data.short_motivation: I need to give the Message in a bottle to the spider so that it can remove the message for me.
data.mid_motivation: I will write a new message and send it to find some allies.
data.long_motivation: I will rebuild my beach house and continue to search for allies to return to my homeland.
